featured.text: The doctor insisted on office visits every three weeks, even when she was feeling well.
In the dream the cloakroom attendant at a theater stopped me in the lobby and insisted on my ___(31)___
I thanked him (36) but he insisted that we should go there for dinner.
After dinner, Richard offered to pay the bill, but May insisted that they do it .

definition.zh_def: 堅持，強調，要求某事必須發生或被接受。
definition.en_def: To demand something forcefully, not allowing refusal.
definition.example: She insisted on attending the meeting despite feeling unwell.
